description:
The story centers on Mikoto Shiratori, a childhood prodigy at badminton, but who never recovered from a major loss during a high school competition. Now, he works in the sales department of the Sunlight Beverage company, playing badminton on the side.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: リーマンズクラブ バドリーマンレポート

node.description:
Scriptwriter and production manager affiliated with [Lapin Track](https://anilist.co/studio/6213/Lapin-Track). Originating as a production manager for [Brain's Base](https://anilist.co/studio/112/Brains-Base) before slowly transitioning into a scriptwriter under them.

Founder of animation studio Lapin Track alongside [Masakazu Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/148153/Masakazu-Watanabe).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/suzupin) | [Tumblr](https://suzupin.tumblr.com/)

Yasuda began drawing when he was 19 years old, after being inspired by [Range Murata](https://anilist.co/staff/98445/Range-Murata)'s pictures. As an illustrator he usually works with novels, providing the cover art and illustrations. He also makes logo designs for companies and games.  He also works on Range Murata's Robot, where he did the chapters: "Ebony & Ivory (Volume 1 & 2)" and "Minus R (Volume 4)"; despite having different names they are part of the same storyline.

[Website (Hedworks)](http://hedworks.sakura.ne.jp/info.html) | [Twitter (Hedworks)](https://twitter.com/hed_works)

The president of Hedworks, a company that produces background art for anime and games.

_Note: Not to be confused with either of the two animators, [佐藤雅弘](https://anilist.co/staff/134126/) and [佐藤正博](https://anilist.co/staff/222513/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.
Emiko Onodera is a digital painter.

name.native: フォックス・キャプチャー・プラン

node.description: A Japanese three-piece instrumental band founded in 2011.

__[Website](http://uni-mafumafu.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/uni-mafumafu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uni_mafumafu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOTR1tcOAhjgi6YukrPpZxg) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/uni_mafumafu)__

__Introduction:__
Mafumafu, alternatively known as Kagami Mite Shisshin-P, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, vocaloid producer, and audio engineer. He is better known as a utaite with a middle-high range voice.

__Biography:__
As a utaite he likes to add effects to his voice and scream loudly in his covers. He has a very wide vocal range and a versatile voice, having the ability to hit and leap into high notes effortlessly, sometimes to feminine range, without sounding strained or loosing the softness in his voice. However, he also sounds pleasant when he sings songs in his regular and lower voice, which can sound relaxing and quite soothing. On some of his covers, many people are often confused and argue about his gender when he utilizes his higher register, therefore making him a ryouserui. Because of his high vocal range, he is also capable of producing a very convincing female voice, most clearly seen in his cover of Matryoshka. He often makes use of his wide range in his covers by leaping into higher or lower octaves to match the tone of the song.

Occasionally he forgets some of the lyrics and either mumbles or makes cute noises until the next line. His songs are often tagged as someone with a "kakuseirui", also known as an energizing voice.
